thread.title: Watch Jimmy Kimmel Troll Donald Trump on Twitter While Hosting 2017 Oscars
thread.title_full: Watch Jimmy Kimmel Troll Donald Trump on Twitter While Hosting 2017 Oscars

author: Chris Payne
title: Watch Jimmy Kimmel Troll Donald Trump on Twitter While Hosting 2017 Oscars
text:
ABC/Eddy Chen Jimm Kimmel during the 89th Oscars on Feb. 26, 2017. 
First-time Oscar host Jimmy Kimmel mocked Donald Trump during his opening monologue and kept the barbs coming later in the show. One memorable bit focused on the source of many of the Presidentâ€™s famous fumbles: Twitter. 
Knowing the thin-skinned Trump is easily offended by televised entertainment , Kimmel had his cell phone displayed on the Oscars' big screen and, in real time, tweeted at the POTUS: Hey @realDonaldTrump u up?
